1: <pb/><e>Bit yet chi ajtok eb israel bay Jerusalén.</e> <pb/><t>A yet chi wilontok jolomlak witz, chi walon yul wet: ¿Baytal chi tit in colbanil? quin chi.</t>
2: <t>A bay Jehová chi tit in colbanil, Cham yesnemal aj satcan, c'al tx'otx' tx'otx'.</t>
3: <pb/><t>Man ok yal c'ul Jehová ok ach telc'ojok, c'am bay ok oc numnaj wayan Cham chach tayneni.</t>
4: <t>C'am bak'in chi wayi, c'amak toni. A Cham co taynemal ayon Israel on ti', c'am chi wayi.</t>
5: <t>A Jehová chach tayneni, a Cham ayic' a c'atan yuj enelok.</t>
6: <t>Man ok ach tz'a yuj k'ak'al c'u yet c'ualil; tamwal ok ach yetnej xajaw yet ak'balil.</t>
7: <pb/><t>A Jehová chach colon el bay masanil tzet yetal ay is may. A Cham chach colon el yul k'ab camich.</t>
8: <t>A Cham chach taynen yet chach toji, c'al yet chach meltzoji, tinani' c'al yin tojbalk'inal.</t>
